mapper.insert: insert into comment (commentWriter, commentContent, commentInsertDate, articleId, commentParentsId) values(#{commentWriter},#{commentContent},now(),#{articleId}, #{commentParentsId});
mapper.select: select c.commentId, c.commentWriter, c.commentContent, date_format(c.commentInsertDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') commentInsertDate, c.commentParentsId, c.articleId, (select memberName from member where memberId = c.commentWriter) commentWriterName from comment c where c.commentDeleteDate is null and c.articleId = #{articleId} order by if(isnull(c.commentParentsId), c.commentId, c.commentParentsId);
